tool_description: Manages and prioritizes reviews requiring human moderation based on analysis results and business rules, organizing them into actionable queues.

review_id.description: Unique identifier for the review being queued

moderation_flags.description: Array of moderation flags raised by analysis tools

priority_indicators.description: Array of priority indicators affecting queue position

estimated_review_time.description: Estimated time in minutes for human review

error_messages: Invalid review ID: Review ID cannot be empty
No moderation flags: At least one moderation flag must be provided
Invalid estimated time: Review time must be positive integer
Too many flags: Maximum 20 moderation flags allowed
Empty priority indicators: Priority indicators array cannot be empty
usage: Provide review ID, moderation flags, and priority indicators to add review to appropriate moderation queue. Set estimated_review_time and assign_to_specialist for better queue management.

priority_level.description: Assigned priority level: low, medium, high, urgent

assigned_queue.description: Name of the moderation queue assigned to

estimated_wait_time.description: Estimated wait time in minutes before human review
